LanguageData.TM_Whirlwind.description: The Gladiator launches into a frenzied attack, dancing forward in a furious whirlwind of steel and death.
LanguageData.TM_Cleave.description: Executes a powerful, sweeping blow that can strike multiple enemies adjacent to the target. As long as the gladiator has enough stamina, this ability works automatically whenever the gladiator performs a melee attack. Cleave chance is calculated from weapon mass - heavier weapons are more likely to cleave.
